### ðŸŸ¢ **If Approved**

> Your protocol has been **approved** by the SPUP Research Ethics Committee.
> You may now proceed with the conduct of your study following the approved protocol and documents.
>
> **Instructions:**
>
> 1. Ensure all study activities follow the approved procedures and ethical conditions.
> 2. Submit **progress reports** (Form 09B) based on the risk level and timeline indicated in your approval letter.
> 3. Submit a **Final Report** (Form 14A) within one month after study completion.
> 4. For any changes or amendments to your protocol, accomplish and submit **Form 10A** before implementation.
>
> *For clarifications, use the systemâ€™s messaging function to contact the REC Secretariat or Chair.*

### ðŸŸ¡ **If Minor Modification Required**

> Your protocol requires **minor revisions** based on the reviewersâ€™ comments.
> Please refer to the attached documents for specific recommendations.
>
> **Instructions:**
>

> 2. Revise your documents accordingly.

### ðŸŸ  **If Major Modification Required**

> Your protocol requires **major revisions** before approval can be considered.
> The revised version will undergo a **full board review** upon resubmission.
>
> **Instructions:**
>
> 1. Review the detailed feedback in your attached decision letter.
> 2. Address all major concerns and recommendations.
> 3. Submit your revised protocol using **Form 08A â€“ Protocol Resubmission Form** within **14 days**.
> 4. Wait for notice of your schedule for the next full board review.

### âšª **If Exempted from Review**

> Your protocol has been **exempted from full ethics review**.
> The study may proceed under the conditions stated in the attached communication.
>
> **Instructions:**
>
> 1. Conduct your study as described in your approved submission.
> 2. Submit a **Final Report (Form 14A)** within one month after completion of the study.
> 3. If your study scope or method changes, inform the REC immediately for reassessment.
>
> *Use the system messaging function if you have any clarifications.*

### ðŸ”µ **If Deferred**

> The REC has **deferred** its decision on your protocol pending additional information or clarification.
>
> **Instructions:**
>
> 1. Review the attached document for the committeeâ€™s specific requirements or questions.
> 2. Submit the requested documents or responses through the system within **7 days**.
> 3. Notify the REC Secretariat via the system messaging once your response is uploaded.
> 4. The committee will deliberate again upon receipt of complete information.

### ðŸ”´ **If Disapproved**

> Your protocol was **not approved** by the SPUP Research Ethics Committee.
> Please review the attached decision letter for the reasons and recommendations provided by the committee.
>
> You may **appeal this decision** if you believe that:
>
> * There was a misunderstanding or error in the review process, or
> * You can provide new or clarifying information relevant to the decision.
>
> **Instructions (Based on SOP 16 â€“ Management of Appeals):**
>
> 1. Accomplish **Form 16 â€“ Protocol Appeal Application Form** (available in the system).
> 2. Attach any **supporting documents** that clarify or justify your appeal.
> 3. Submit your appeal within **10 working days** from the date of decision release through the system.
> 4. Wait for confirmation that your appeal has been received and logged.
> 5. The appeal will undergo **full board review**, and the final decision will be communicated within **10 working days** after complete documentation is received.
>
> *Use the systemâ€™s messaging function to contact the REC Secretariat or Chair if you need assistance with your appeal.*
